title: My league won't launch
body: I try to launch League and it says that my pvp.net patcher kernel doesnt work. I have tried reinstalling it several times someone please help.

replies.body: This issue is usually due to a setting with your OS or something else that's blocking the patcher. I suggest checking out our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to resolve this issue.  Let me know if you have any qeustions!
